Reviews.Title: “Convenient location and spacious rooms, but a few problems”

Reviews.Content: stayed 2 weeks business trip hotel chosen due convenient location happy spacious breakfast interfered business trip internet connection slow nonexistent due challenges service provider lobby connection water dripping ceiling bathroom towels sink floor hear drip drip night offered change fixed begin phone stolen management address issue compensated night stay 14 expenses incurred due missing phone ran bill lock valuables laptop phone etc guarantees stay safe otherwise

Reviews.Title: “Very good except for air conditioning!”
Reviews.Author: emmanuel137
Reviews.Content: chose hotel close location wont perfect bar service excellent friendly quality english spoken experienced elsewhere spain including madrid apportioned comfortable bathroom size minor criticisms little cleaner picky smelled little smoke probably historical issue difficult smell rid air conditioning properly hot night am fixed moved time realised bed couldnt bothered time running short dinner fine exceptional passable free minibar nice touch hotels im picky traveller rare perfect hotel isnt despite stay weeks time
